tool_description: An API to gather and display all news released by Zambia's top online newspapers.
name: Watchman
title: Watchman

api_list.name: Get Article
api_list.description: This endpoint gets the article of a specific news id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://watchman.p.rapidapi.com/news/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "watchman.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://watchman.p.rapidapi.com/news/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "watchman.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Specific Source
api_list.description:
Get news from a specific sources by using any one of the following keywords.
- `lusakatimes`
- `dailymail`
- `zambianobserver`
- `zambianwatchdog`

Results can be > 200
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://watchman.p.rapidapi.com/news/source/lusakatimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "watchman.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://watchman.p.rapidapi.com/news/source/{tag}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "watchman.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get News
api_list.description: This endpoint displays all the news from the news sites.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://watchman.p.rapidapi.com/news/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "watchman.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
